short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DAPPA Clip enables you to virtually try on garments from any website using Tailor, DAPPA's AI VTON Model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop shopping clothes online only to return them a week later because they didn't look how you expected.

Get DAPPA Clip, and see any garment on yourself while shopping on your favourite sites.

DAPPA Clip 

Shows you any garments on yourself in real-time
Using DAPPA's Internal Tailor AI Model, DAPPA can show you any garments on yourself in real-time. 

Works on any website
From your Pinterest boards to your favourite shopping websites. DAPPA Clip works with any website. Just pick the image of the garments you want to try on.

Coming Soon 
Sync with the DAPPA App
Garments you buy/save will sync with the DAPPA App for you to use in your wardrobe to generate outfits with later for any occassion.

Sizing Recommendations
DAPPA will recommend you what size you should be buying for the best fit possible.

What are you waiting for? Download DAPPA Clip and experience the future of fashion now.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
By using the DAPPA Clip browser extension, you agree to DAPPA's terms and conditions. (https://www.dappa.fashion/terms)
 
Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
